content: this legal text summarizes the division of property among several parties the parties involved are mr pp mrs cam mrs lam mr ta mrs bm mrs fm and mr tm the property in question is an urban area surrounding a building in the municipality of castelfidardo the area is divided into different portions each assigned to a specific party with the value of each share specified the parties agree to end the coownership and divide the property accordingly the document provides details of each share including the specific urban area and its value as well as the legal requirements and certifications related to the property the summary concludes by mentioning a sale but the specific details are not provided
